doc:
Bob Todd https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Todd 0 Brian Todd (15 December 1921 – 21 October 1992), known professionally as Bob Todd, was an English comedy actor, mostly known for appearing as a straight man in the sketch shows of Benny Hill and Spike Milligan. For many years he lived in Tunbridge Wells, Kent. Brian_Todd ( 15_December_1921 – 21_October_1992 ) , known professionally as Bob_Todd , was an_English_comedy_actor , mostly_known for appearing as a_straight_man in the_sketch_shows of Benny_Hill and Spike_Milligan . For many_years he lived in Tunbridge_Wells , Kent .
